DataElement.preferredName: Patient Allogeneic Bone Marrow Transplantation Or Organ Transplantation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response indicating whether a patient has or has not had an allogeneic bone marrow transplant or an organ transplant that meets the eligibility criteria for participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Allogeneic Bone Marrow Transplantation Or Organ Transplantation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A procedure in which a person receives stem cells (cells from which all blood cells develop) from a genetically similar, but not identical, donor._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The transfer of an organ (or part of one) from one body to another, for the purpose of replacing the recipient's damaged or failing organ with a working one from the donor. Donors can be living, or cadaveric (dead)._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Allogeneic Bone Marrow Transplantation Or Organ Transplantation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A procedure in which a person receives stem cells (cells from which all blood cells develop) from a genetically similar, but not identical, donor.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:The transfer of an organ (or part of one) from one body to another, for the purpose of replacing the recipient's damaged or failing organ with a working one from the donor. Donors can be living, or cadaveric (dead).:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A clinical treatment in which a patient receives bone marrow from a compatible, but not genetically identical, donor.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

The transfer of an organ, organ part, or tissue from one body to another, for the purpose of replacing the recipient's damaged or failing organ with a working one from the donor. Donors can be living, or cadaveric (dead).
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient had prior allogen
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior allogenic bone marrow or organ transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior organ allograft or allogenic transplantation, if the transplanted tissue is still in place?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient at least 3 months post allo-HCT (at time of treatment start)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior organ transplantation including allogeneic stem cell transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior organ transplants (i.e. renal, lung, heart) due to the potential for increased rejection with immunotherapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had prior allogenic organ transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior allogeneic hematologic transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a previous solid organ transplant or allogenic stem cell transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of organ transplant or stem cell transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior allogeneic stem cell transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of solid organ transplantation or allogeneic bone marrow transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had a prior allogenic bone marrow transplantation within the past 5 years or has had a prior solid organ transplantation at any point?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have prior allogeneic stem cell or solid organ transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of allogenic organ transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior allogenic organ transplantation including allogeneic stem cell transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior allogenic bone marrow or solid organ transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of allogeneic organ or stem cell transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had allogeneic stem cell transplant or solid organ transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 17
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had a liver, lung, heart, or pancreas transplant; or allogeneic stem cell transplant; or any kind of bone marrow transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 18
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of prior allogenic organ transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient undergone solid organ or allogenic hematopoietic transplant at any time?
